title: Legal Landscape Of Cannabis Industry With Patricia Heer
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Patricia Heer is Editor and co-founder of Cannabis Law Digest, an online platform of legal resources for the cannabis industry. With her extensive litigation and commercial experience, Patricia joins Rena Sherbill to break down the convoluted legal landscape in the cannabis industry. They also discuss why advocates have a problem with the SAFE Banking Act, the impediments to wide-spread legalization and the best ways for companies to navigate regulations. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
